Full Description: At FiredUP, they love building great companies. Their program is six months of high-intensity action designed for one thing: to quickly propel a choice group of promising startups into the market. They’re focused on building real, sustainable businesses with the potential to scale. Their philosophy is simple — great companies can stand on their own two feet. Through infusing southern hospitality with innovative technology, entrepreneurs in Columbia utilize the resources available to them to create a thriving, and growing, startup community.
